title: Reality Is Satirizing Capitalism, Where Are The Jackass Guys Now? 2.6.18
itunes:title: Reality Is Satirizing Capitalism, Where Are The Jackass Guys Now? 2.6.18
description:
In episode 79, Jack & Miles are joined by writer Adam Tod Brown to discuss the stock market plunge, disaster capitalism in Puerto Rico, how the Jackass guys are doing, plus producer Anna joins to talk about her podcast Ethnically Ambiguous, & more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
